text: Merkulayevka () is a rural locality (a settlement) in Dakhovskoye Rural Settlement of Maykopsky District, Russia. The population was 52 as of 2018. There are 3 streets. == Geography == The settlement is located in the valley of the Merkulayevka River, 9.5 km from Dakhovskaya. == References == Category:Rural localities in Maykopsky District
title: Merkulayevka
